name: opensearch
description: OpenSearch is a distributed search and analytics engine based on Apache Lucene. It provides a RESTful multi-tenant database with a HTTP web interface and schema-free JSON documents.
values:
# OpenSearch configuration
# Ref: https://github.com/opensearch-project/helm-charts/blob/main/charts/opensearch/values.yaml

## Global settings
global:
  imageRegistry: ""
  imagePullSecrets: []
  storageClass: ""

## OpenSearch settings
opensearch:
  ## OpenSearch image settings
  image:
    repository: opensearchproject/opensearch
    tag: "2.16.0"
    pullPolicy: IfNotPresent
  
  ## Number of OpenSearch nodes
  replicas: 2
  
  ## JVM settings
  jvmOptions: "-Xmx512m -Xms512m"
  
  ## Resources settings
  resources:
    limits:
      cpu: 1000m
      memory: 1Gi
    requests:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 512Mi
  
  ## Persistence settings
  persistence:
    enabled: true
    size: 30Gi
    storageClass: ""
  
  ## OpenSearch cluster settings
  cluster:
    name: opensearch-cluster
    masterNodes: 2
    ingestNodes: 2
    dataNodes: 2

## OpenSearch Dashboards settings
dashboards:
  enabled: true
  
  image:
    repository: opensearchproject/opensearch-dashboards
    tag: "2.16.0"
    pullPolicy: IfNotPresent
  
  replicas: 1
  
  resources:
    limits:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 512Mi
    requests:
      cpu: 250m
      memory: 256Mi
  
  service:
    type: ClusterIP
    port: 5601

## Security settings
security:
  enabled: false
  
  # Admin password secret (if security is enabled)
  adminSecret: ""

## Networking settings
networking:
  httpPort: 9200
  transportPort: 9300

## Metrics and monitoring
metrics:
  enabled: false
  prometheus:
    serviceMonitor:
      enabled: false
